To determine whether an expression evaluates to `true` or `false`,
one must use the `() = ()` block,
to compare the value of the expression with a constant.

frontmatter.shortDescription: To test whether an expression evaluates to true or false, one must compare it to a constant
frontmatter.shortCorrection: To test whether an expression evaluates to true or false, one can just use it
